metadata.title: CVE-2019-9433 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
In libvpx, there is a possible information disclosure due to improper inputvalidation. This could lead to remote information disclosure with noadditional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed forexploitation. Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10Android ID: A-80479354

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9433` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvpx6 - 1.8.1-2
vpx-tools - 1.8.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvpx package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.1-2').
